item.title: Sensex and Nifty Slip Amid Mixed Sector Performance; JBM Auto and Trent Lead Gains
item.description: The Indian equity markets closed lower on 25 December 2025, with the Sensex retreating by 116.14 points to 85,408.70 and the Nifty 50 index ending at 26,142.10, down 35.05 points. Market breadth remained weak as declines outnumbered advances across the BSE500, while sectoral trends showed a predominance of losses with only a handful of sectors managing gains. Time: 3 minutes ago
